name: Mountain of Doom HD for iPad - Top Free Motorbike Racing Game
name_original: Mountain of Doom HD for iPad - Top Free Motorbike Racing Game
description:
Get ready to race the slopes in one of the most exciting motorbike games.

First test your motorbike on Mountain of Doom where you will need to take some time to home in on your skills.

Next try performing those tricks you just mastered under the star lit sky. From here on out you take your chances as you attempt to conquer the highest Peaks and Canyons.

Race against time as you perform flips, cannonballs, chicken salad, the suitcase or the elusive cross rocket. Increase your score with any of the above moves, but be sure to leave enough time to make it to the lodge, or you will be left out in the cold somewhere on top of the mountain.

Fun for the entire family!

Features include:
* Challenging levels
* Race against the clock (the Mummy's)
* 5 in air tricks for additional points
* Gather as many coins for additional points
* 5 characters to choose from (male or female)
* Power Boosts to help you get through challenging level
* Level Skips - When you just can't get past that one level

Compete against your friends in our multiplayer action where you can actually see the progress of your friends on your screen!

To get speed simply press and hold your finger on the screen when going downhill and release when going uphill. Sounds easy, but there is definitely a strategy required in order to make it down in the allotted time.

Feedback and game improvements are always suggested and welcomed! We are making the game for you, so you know what is best. Send your feedback to admin@greatappsmediagroup.com or visit us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/pages/Mountain-of-Doom/442466839208813

Have fun! Post your scores on our Facebook page! and be sure to login to Game Centre to post your highest score.
